    • About Ben Martin


    First and foremost, I am a loving father to my three amazing children, Brennan, Emma and Brody. I am a graduate of CSUF with a degree in Communications. I am a 3rd generation Real Estate Broker, with a team that has over 16 years experience.

    I pride myself in giving my clients the best service possible. I study homes and prices every day in order to be able to give my clients the most accurate information about homes in this area. We use the most up-to-date systems and technology to give our clients the greatest amount of exposure possible when helping them to sell or buy a home. It is our commitment to provide each and every client with a 10+ experience. We promise to provide Real Answers to Real Questions about Real Estate!
